sentences.sContent: Probe into the design principle of cipher systems irrelevant to computing power, design cipher systems with provable safety, and analyze the defects of existent cipher systems.
sentences.sContent_eng: Probe into the design principle of cipher systems irrelevant to computing power, design cipher systems with provable safety, and analyze the defects of existent cipher systems.
sentences.sCn: 探索与计算能力无关的密码体制的设计原理，设计可证明安全性的密码体制，分析现有密码体制的缺陷。

words.tran: 证明地；可查验地；试验得出地
证明；检验；表现出；钻探（prove的过去分词）
